mule.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/email http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/email/current/mule-email.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core/current/mule.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core/current/mule-ee.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http/current/mule-http.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/file http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/file/current/mule-file.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/batch/current/mule-batch.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/azure-key-vault http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/azure-key-vault/current/mule-azure-key-vault.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/java http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/java/current/mule-java.xsd

set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload
Set Payload
Set Payload

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 import * from dw::Runtime output application/json --- payload wait 20000

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logType":"Error: ", "code": 400, "message": "Bad Request", "errorType": "APIKIT:BAD_REQUEST", "dateTime": now(), "description": "The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax", "source": "APIKIT" }]

#[%dw 2.0 output application/json ns soap http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/ var records = payload mapObject ((value) -> value mapObject ((value) -> value) mapObject ((value) -> value)) var body = valuesOf(records) --- if ( body[0] is Object ) body else ""]

#[%dw 2.0 output application/json ns soap http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/ var records = payload mapObject ((value) -> value mapObject ((value) -> value) mapObject ((value) -> value)) var body = valuesOf(records) --- if ( body[0] is Object ) body else ""]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Strings --- "roc:Create" ++ (substring (vars.entity as String, 0, sizeOf(vars.entity as String) - 1)) ++ "Request"
%dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Strings --- "roc:Update" ++ (substring (vars.entity as String, 0, sizeOf(vars.entity as String) - 1)) ++ "Request"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- (vars.externalId): { (if(vars.mysqlOutput != "") "mysql" : vars.mysqlOutput else null ), (if(vars.mongoOutput != "") "mongo" : vars.mongoOutput else null ) }

http:request.doc:name: Query to MySQL

when.expression: #[!isEmpty(vars.mysqlOutput mapObject ((value, key, index) -> "":key contains "Create") filterObject ((value, key, index) -> value))]

http:request.doc:name: Query to Mongo

when.expression: #[!isEmpty(vars.mongoOutput mapObject ((value, key, index) -> "":key contains "Create") filterObject ((value, key, index) -> value))]

email:send.subject: Error Log
email:send.doc:name: Send error email to report mail box CP1

logger.doc:name: Logger mail connector
logger.message: SUCCESS: Sended error mail mesages . Common project
